title: New Releases and More for October 11, 2016
description:
This week, Liberty and Rebecca discuss The Mothers, Hag-Seed, A Life in Parts, and more books.
This show has been sponsored by Book Riot Live, PrepDish and FabFitFun.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or iTunes and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
For a complete list of books discussed in this episode, visit our website.

Books discussed on the show:
Hag-Seed by Margaret Atwood
The Mothers by Brit Bennett
The Red Car by Marcy Dermansky
Drinking in America: Our Secret History by
Do Not Say We Have Nothing by Madeleine Thien
On Trails: An Exploration by Robert Moor
Where the Mountain Meets the Moon by Grace Lin
The Crossing Places by Elly Griffiths
The Golden Age by Joan London
The Assimilated Cuban’s Guide to Quantum Santeria by Carlos Hernandez
The World’s Largest Man by Harrison Scott Key
By Gaslight by Steven Price
Angels of Music by Kim Newman
A Life in Parts by Bryan Cranston

What we’re reading:
Ill Will by Dan Chaon
Difficult Women by Roxane Gay
The Rest of Us Just Live Here by Patrick Ness
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
